msItem.title: Magna carta with statutes, register of writs.

history.provenance: Provenance: Inscr. ‘Iste liber constat Thome Bathe ad reversionem ad Thomam Blerweye inde spectante’, 14th c.; ‘Liber Johannis Whyte per Johanne Welbek’, 15th c. front fly-leaf; ‘... et Johanni Greyne de Prestleigh de parochia de Doulty… Johanni Drynkwater de Hoyningesham’, f. 123v; David Laing, olim Laing 188.

body.p:
Edinburgh, University Library
MS 156. Magna carta with statutes, register of writs. 123 ff. 255 x 175 mm.
Provenance: Inscr. ‘Iste liber constat Thome Bathe ad reversionem ad Thomam Blerweye inde spectante’, 14th c.; ‘Liber Johannis Whyte per Johanne Welbek’, 15th c. front fly-leaf; ‘... et Johanni Greyne de Prestleigh de parochia de Doulty… Johanni Drynkwater de Hoyningesham’, f. 123v; David Laing, olim Laing 188.
Bibliography: Borland, pp. 236–7.
